text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I'm high risk due to my disability and COPD.  Today you sounded ready to call it quits on current COVID19 protocol and go back to business as usual. Please move only according to Dr.  Fauci and the task force  or you will kill people like me and many others!
